#summary The onbeforedeactivate event fires before an element stops being the active element.
#labels about-dom,is-dom-event,from-microsoft

== Usage ==

== Event targets ==

The `onbeforeactivate` event fires on these objects:

  * [HtmlElements all elements]
  * [DocumentObject document]
